name: Office Heroes
description:
Office Heroes is a game of regular office workers - that is, until they mysteriously receive office-based super powers! But they're not the only ones affected, and the office might be in danger...

Office Heroes is a light-hearted storytelling game for 2-6 players, over 60-90 minutes (including set up and rules learning).
Perfect for a oneshot, team games night, or introducing someone to their first storytelling game.

To play, just click 'download'. This will take you to the Office Heroes webpage.
From there, select 'Create Session'. Share the link in your browser with your fellow players, and away you go!

Any donations go to helping us make even more fun and connective games, and are super (hehe) appreciated!
